title: Account with a suspension on another server with same name can i switch server
body:
i have a summoner name and im wanting to switch to OCE
but there is someone with the same name as me, but i think they were suspended, is it possible to keep my name?

replies.body: Names are still protected by the[ summoner name clean up](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-), even if it's been suspended.  Should the name elapse, you'll be able to grab it then.  I hope that helps clear things up!
so just wait 2.5 years to pass since their suspension? okay, thanks heaps
